text: I recently purchased the HP Victus (Ryzen 5 5600H, RTX 3050, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 144Hz, Backlit KB, Enhanced Cooling), and it has exceeded my expectations!Performance & Display:The Ryzen 5 5600H + RTX 3050 combo delivers smooth gaming and multitasking. The 15.6” FHD IPS 144Hz display offers sharp visuals and a seamless experience.Build & Features:Sleek design, backlit keyboard, and enhanced cooling make it great for long hours of use. Windows 11 & MS Office 2021 pre-installed is a big plus!Heavy Weight !Only one downside is its heavy weight, which makes it a bit difficult to carry at times.Final Verdict:At Rs. 58,800, this laptop is a steal! Powerful, well-built, and feature-packed—highly recommended! Read more
